## Why This Redirect?

Claude Code loads CLAUDE.md files from the current directory and parent directories. To avoid duplication and ensure you always have the latest documentation, the authoritative Kaizen guide is maintained in `sdk-users/apps/kaizen/CLAUDE.md`.
